commits.comment: Update to released version 3 of commons-sandbox-parent pom
Add copyright statement to NOTICE, license and inception year to pom

initial code base : - basic repository to create/retrieve monitors - convenience Monitoring utility class - composite monitor key inspired by Moskito - StopWatch to estimate process execution duration - simple monitor to access statValues - Gauge and Counter implementation of statValue - ConcurrencyGauge to compute average concurrent threads - reporting to export monitors as XML or JSON - test cases
Set svn properties (keywords and eol style)
fix to broken link and bad english
- rename read methods to getXX (javabean convention) - override getMean for Gauge (testcase included) - rename stats methods to match commons-math terminology
- txt renderer (for logs) - simplified renderer testing - composite Gauge & Counter (required for period based monitoring) - cleaner separation between simpleGauge and simpleCounter
- Event based notification for StatValue threshold - some tiny doc - simplified ExecutionStack usage via StopWatches auto-registration and auto-cleanup
- Monitor implementation refactored as a class hierarchy - Composite gauge/counter with less synchronization requirements - Implementation classes renamed to expose features - thread-safety test
jars removed from SVN to follow commons sandbox conventions retrotranslator configuration commented (wating for MAVENUPLOAD request)
- Composite statValues implementation & test case - DefaultRepository to user CompositeValuesMonitor - Value Listener+ Threshold implementation
- Composite statValues implementation & test case - DefaultRepository to user CompositeValuesMonitor - Value Listener+ Threshold implementation
secondary monitors : attach to live monitors, watch monitored activity and detach (base for history graphs and other time-based features)
reverted change to use System.nanotime() as documented in http://wiki.apache.org/commons/Monitoring/Precision
Add a description to pom (for the summary page), fix the logo location and add license header to proposal
documentation periodic reporting to logs using secondaryRepository StopWatch redesigned as interface
Upgrade to version 4 of commons-sandbox-parent and add properties for commons-build-plugin
Generate Issue Tracking pages using commons-build-plugin and update site menus

- implementations refactored as a class hierarchy, beeing easier to extend and cleaner to discover repository features - dedicated packages for component implementations - reporting for HTML output - web UI servlet extending HTML reporting with JavaScript enhancements (JQuery)
Introduce Unit in counter and gauges to avoid incompatible data type Improve Renderer with Options for filtering and units Improve web UI
fix some PMD violations fix xdoc
increase TO to avoid failure when ran by cobertura
fix Selector not being determinist when multiple get methods with various args fix monitor.Key constructor to avoid nulls add convenience Monitoring.start( Monitor )
add support for commons-proxy interceptors AbstractPerformanceInterceptor for common method interception features, to be derived according to method interception APIs
fix sorting in Web UI broken by locale-dependent number formats
fix unexpected columns when monitors hold heterogenous statvalues
fix unexpected columns when monitors hold heterogenous statvalues - CSS style
add the option to handle errors
add the option to handle errors
Add date (long) of secondary repository attachement/detachement from observed repository change PeriodicLogger to explicitly use a SecondaryRepository Repository Decorator for historization

historization of repository based on a decorator : - complete Detachable interface - EmptyMonitor to avoid nullPointer - enhance Reporter to support detachable - Refactored MonitoringListener for webapps
allow access to the active SecondaryRepository
PeriodicLogger can be started at a fixed Date
new "Role" concept to describe a statValue in a monitor. Includes name and Unit as a prototype for create-on-demand
initial code base for JSP tags Role now requires a StatValue type
Schema validation failed within IntelliJ - fixed that
basic JSP tag library for the reporting web UI support for intergation with springframework using AutoProxyCreators
Pulling in test dependencies for the jetty plugin - this allows to use test classes (e.g. servlets)

COMMONSSITE-30 - fix the checkstyle configuration to work for multi-module and review/update <reporting> plugin version numbers for the poms being changed.  - pom's need to use ${basedir} for configuration files as the multi-module profile is run from commons-parent, so if not specified it can't find those files  - the checkstyle configuration file needs to use ${checkstyle.header.file} for the headerFile property and  <headerFile> element added to the plugin config in the pom.xml  - fix m1 checkstyle config to reflect the above where appropriate (specify header file property)
render sum of squares to support post-processing of stats and datas from multiple instances (cluster) aggregation
render sum of squares to support post-processing of stats and datas from multiple instances (cluster) aggregation
use ThreadMxBean to compute CPU time
change commons-sandbox-parent to version 7 and re-generate issue-tracking pages to correct comment
fix inconsistent min/max value in gauges
avoid method override in design, set method final where possible
expected result was wrong : hit is expected to be "1" after the gauge has been set
bugFix : Thread history is not cleared if to level StopWatch is canceled

cleaner rendering architecture : o AbstractVisitor supports filtering and defines start/end "event" method o FormatVisitor applies formatting on "events" o Format implementations to support specific data layout and separators (XML + JSON)
Generate custom Mailing List pages for sandbox components (using "mvn commons:mail-page") See http://commons.apache.org/commons-build-plugin/mail-page.html
@Override not allowed for interfaces in Java 1.5
apply path provided by Romain Manni-Bucau
removing gauge which weren't really gauge, replacing it by a counter in counters, adding basic config, splitting in several modules
basic gui + getting rid of visitable/visitor pattern for formats
moving clear/reset button on report page + adding links to convert in ms/ns/s + mapping report.csv, report.xml, report.json
move dependency to dptMngt in parent pom
move dependency to dptMngt in parent pom
adding jmx plugin + moving format in handler + using resources from classloader instead of sevletcontext to be able to embed the jar easily
replacing hardcoded report stuff in MonitoringController by a plugin
avoiding css ambiguity + adding bootstrap-dropdown to replace the breadcrumb in report page
escaping method parameter by parameter for jmx method invocation + fixing JMX names of counters
adding a basic test for spring module
getting rid of monitor (counter should be enough)
CounterStopWatch doesn't need a role, it is in the counter
Role makes much more sense in counter package now
getting rid of CXF module which can be replace by the web one
adding gauge concept (= way to get a measure)
first JVM page with CPU and memory usage (last ten measures by default, measures are done each 4s)
reworking plugin API, in particular getting rid of Handler/Renderer to use something closer to REST (@Regex)
Allow build to work on Maven 2.2.1
adding session listener to monitor sessions
configure reporting: no need of cobertura, aggregate javadoc only from top
configure tomcat maven plugin to be able to run tomcat7:run
Fix the default NameExtractor implementation so that it does not fail with a NPE if the pointcut is on a static method.
move dependency-reduced-pom.xml out of the scm tree
use a bean rather than parameters to ease futur extensions
use more recent version of commons-math
fix equals and use a better toString()
make those fields private as they are exposed via getter
improve home page with links on others pages
use a ConcurrentHashMap to prevent possible concurrency issues
Trim package entry to makes it possible to use identation in web.xml
Fix the Gauge discovery mechanism which is broken when more than one entry
Makes it possible to override resources - ie. theme
Adding a constant for the activation flag.
String... is an empty array by default - at least on some jdk - and not null so let handle it
removing GaugeObserver and using DataStore API to write a GraphiteDataStore
logging IO errors instead of swallowing it
ensuring we don't have any space which could corrupt the sent data in keys
fixing js of jta view + handling css/js content-type
audo destroy for BatchCounterDataStore + findOrCreate instead of systematic newInstance
allowing to configure cdi monitoring through properties file
allowing to register automatically reporting gui
making web monitoring automatic in a servlet 3 container (but still configurable) + fixing role name of session monitoring (to distinguish between apps
typo (plural) + using context path in counter name instead of role name for a better filtering
adding a session gauge to monitor the number of sessions and renaming old session counter to session-durations which is more appropriated
adding web plugin - Note: js graph part should be reworked to be centralized
doc config + allowing to monitor multiple urls
Fixing bad scheduling and Graphite test accordingly.
Better rendering numbers in report plugin
Remove the mantis part, it makes things really bad in the UI
fixing number formatting, we don't want to format in csv but only in rendered html + allowing to configure it
keeping webapp context in web monitoring, looks nice to remove it but when you have multiple apps it is quickly the mess
adding a cube module to push to square cube
adding an assert in cube test + using default cube port/url
moving some more cube related logic to Cube + adding marker to be able to know the origin of the event
oops string has tostring but useless to call it now
pushin minimum data when using cube to try to reduce computation overhead
Make it possible to have a different datastore for counter and gauge
adding base for a collector module, ATM counter data are not that consistent + tests need to be written
better thread safety + first collector servlet implementation (in memory) + SPI interface (delegating to ServiceLoader by default) to let user override it if needed
move monitoring to incubator as sirona project
fixing testcase, making it locale and OS agnostic. Failed with Win7/de_DE.
fixing a build failure, back to the present with no Java7.
using sirona.properties + documenting how to monitor cdi/jta without updating any code
making AbstractPerformanceInterceptor configurable to skip too small invocations

better way to configure cdi performance/jta interceptors. Note: config is better but we can't rely add custom interceptors anymore. Surely not an issue since it would be great in DeltaSpike rather than here.
add .gitignore and provide a simple script for git svn setup
add .gitignore file and remove NOTICE as it is generated
cleaning up cdi extension + hashcode/equals in perf interceptor when using dynamic interception
adding AggregatedGaugeDataStore and using it as base for graphite store
if no tx is active we can't call transactionSynchronizationRegistry.getResource + fixing graphite error messages to be more obvious
using aop in web module to reuse the existing logic + monitoring http status
using sb-admin bootstrap theme - need to cleanup gui + add missing tests + add licence but committing it now to be able to not work alone anymore

adding basic tests for all part of the gui (reporting)
removing useless deps + fixing report page
